titles.title: To direct the President to develop and submit to Congress a comprehensive strategy to combat cybercrime, and for other purposes.
To direct the President to develop and submit to Congress a comprehensive strategy to combat cybercrime, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: This bill directs the President to submit to Congress a comprehensive strategy to combat cybercrime, including recommendations for a definition of cybercrime and a federal agency to lead cybercrime investigations.
